entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:38 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
